text: ADDITIONAL CRASH ISSUES (1) What does the DBMS do if it crashes during recovery in the Analysis Phase? » Nothing. Just run recovery again. W hat does the DBMS do if it crashes during recovery in the Redo Phase? » Again nothing. Redo everything again. | EZCMU-DS 4 » PI % 1:09:59/1:18:06 - ANALYSIS PHASE EXAMPLE > [cc K e El E s] « - 21 - ARIES Database Recovery (CMU Databases Systems / Fall 2019)
